backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining smart‑glasses event types, access‑controlled profile APIs, and storage for blink rates, vibrations, and blink summaries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a BLE blink-detection update to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, BLE handling, charts, UI, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables for the app theme.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes and wrapping the UI in BluetoothProvider and AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/actor/ActorBoots: Deprecated wrapper component that now simply renders children without actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication landing screen with Internet Identity login and marketing layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Canvas-based line chart rendering blink-rate history with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkSumm: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/charts/Vibration: File present but contains no implementation (truncated content).
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: Renders a card with an input for selecting a device ID and a link to manage devices.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: Displays example API usage with JavaScript and cURL tabs and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Provides the top navigation header with links to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Deprecated dialog for entering a user name; now always closed and unused.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: Shows live alertness state info and allows generating a personalized sleep schedule.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: Card-based selector for choosing a time range and computing start/end timestamps.
frontend/src/contexts/BluetoothContext.t: Implements Bluetooth connection, notifications, and blink/eye-state processing logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance with identity-aware refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrap.ts: Deprecated hook that formerly handled actor initialization; now a no-op.
frontend/src/hooks/useBleWriteQueue.ts: Deprecated hook returning a no-op BLE write queue interface.
Deprecated hook that once flushed blink data to backend; now returns static values.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Queries the backend for the current user's profile using the actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Manages a device ID in React state and localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: Handles Web Bluetooth connection, notifications, and blink‑rate parsing for EyeR devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context using Dfinity AuthClient with login, logout, and identity loading.
Stores blink‑rate history in localStorage with add, clear, and capped history size.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for fetching and mutating blink rates, vibration events, summaries, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useRollingBlinkRateAv: Computes a rolling 5‑minute blink‑rate average with pruning and add/clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionBlinkRateHi: Tracks in‑memory blink‑rate history for the current session capped at 100 points.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with light/dark theme CSS variables for UI colors and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing live blink data, rolling averages, historical storage, and sleep‑schedule generation.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: React page for connecting to a Bluetooth device, managing UUID settings, tracking blink-rate notifications, and displaying connection status.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Documentation page describing how devices submit telemetry data, including required fields and API examples.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeTest.tsx: UI page that tests backend connectivity by calling basic actor methods and reporting authentication and actor status.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Web Bluetooth GATT interfaces, services, characteristics, and request options.
frontend/src/utils/bleNus.ts: Utilities for parsing Nordic UART Service messages, extracting blink rates, eye-state tokens, and legacy heart-rate–based readings.
frontend/src/utils/bleUuid.ts: Helpers for normalizing and formatting UUIDs for Web Bluetooth use.
frontend/src/utils/bleWriteQueue.ts: LocalStorage-backed queue for storing blink-rate data points before transmission.
frontend/src/utils/localSleepSchedule.ts: Analyzes the last 100 blink-rate readings to compute average BPM and generate sleep and alertness recommendations.
frontend/src/utils/personalizedSleepSche: Maps rolling average BPM to an alertness state and returns a corresponding task or rest schedule.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including versions, features, and a request to treat BLE 'close' notifications as blink events.
